ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mean this as a dig to anyone in particular but this is a great list and I really think we should all work hard on refraining from calling one another s
ygData.messageBody:
I don't mean this as a dig to anyone in particular but this is a great list
and I really think we should all work hard on refraining from calling one
another's ideas stupid or silly. We have over 300 members in our list and
about 10-20 who post regularly - that means we have a lot of lurkers and we
don't want people to be afraid to speak up for fear of being berated or
belittled for their opinion.

I'm all for peace, harmony, and getting along and continuing to have
intelligent and mature debates over issues.

Just something to think about.

- Faras
